content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to see Broadway shows. However, I am aware that Hamilton is widely regarded as one of the best musicals of all time, largely due to its unique blend of hip-hop music and modern dance choreography. The show's creator and original star, Lin-Manuel Miranda, collaborated with choreographer Andy Blankenbuehler to bring a fresh, energetic, and contemporary feel to the dance numbers. The seamless integration of the choreography with the music and storytelling helps to elevate the production to a whole new level. Hamilton's choreography has set a new standard for modern Broadway dance, which is why it continues to win so many accolades and remains highly popular among audiences.
